title: Teacher Professional Development Design Course Utilizing Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and understanding of the elementary education curriculum
context.additional_context: Course focused on elementary school teachers strengthening their self-directed professional development capabilities through blended learning design. Conducted in a BYOD environment with real-time feedback via formative assessment

learning_goals: Can systematically plan teacher professional development programs according to blended learning design principles.
Can produce HTML-based educational content using open-source tools such as the eXe platform.
Can design and implement instructional strategies that integrate real-time online sessions with offline activities.
Can refine and optimize instructional design prototypes based on peer feedback.
Can measure learner engagement using formative assessment tools in blended learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
